outcome: IN CMP. NO.8256/2014 IN CRIME NO.63/2013 DATED 18/11/2014 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-II], KANNUR. ANNEXURE A3 COPY OF THE PETITION AS CMP. NO.5368/2015 IN CRIME NO.63/2013 OF MAYYIL POLI
full_text: BEeahl oe ace 2016/KER/68 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA MONDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2016/14TH POUSHA, 1937 Cri.MC.No. 8061 of 2015 () CRIME NO. 63/2013 OF MAYYIL POLICE STATION. PETITIONER/ACCUSED NO.3: CHATHOTH MOTTAMMAL MUSTHAFA, $/O. MUHAMMEDKUTTY, AGED 20 YEARS, 21/15, MUSTHAFA MANZIL, PULLOPPI, KANNADIPARAMBA, KANNUR DISTRICT. BY ADV. SMT.N.SHAMNA. RESPONDENTS/COMPLAINANT: 1. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. 2. THE STATION HOUSE OFFICER, MAYYIL POLICE STATION, KANNUR DISTRICT. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMTP. MAYA. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: rs. BEeahl Bear 2016/KER/68 Crl.MC.No. 8061 of 2015 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S ANNEXURES:- ANNEXURE A1 COPY OF THE PASSPORT BEARING NO. M 6556872 DATED 26/02/2015 ISSUED FROM PASSPORT OFFICE, KOZHIKODE. ANNEXURE A2 COPY OF THE ORDER IN CMP. NO.8256/2014 IN CRIME NO.63/2013 DATED 18/11/2014 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-II], KANNUR. ANNEXURE A3 COPY OF THE PETITION AS CMP. NO.5368/2015 IN CRIME NO.63/2013 OF MAYYIL POLICE STATION FILED BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-II, KANNUR. ANNEXURE A4 COPY OF THE ORDER IN CMP. NO.5368/2015 IN CRIME NO.63/2013 OF MAYYIL POLICE STATION OF THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-II, KANNUR. ANNEXURE A5 COPY OF THE ORDER IN CRL.MC. NO.7319/2015 OF THIS HON'BLE COURT. RESPONDENT'S ANNEXURES:- NIL. HTRUE COPY// P.S. TO JUDGE rs. 2016/KER/68 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. re ane aye Ee ORDER On going through Annexure-A4 order passed by the court below, it seems that the court below has unnecessarily made a direction that the fact of the case pending against the applicant be endorsed in the Passport. A further direction is also made by the court below to the effect that the petitioner shall surrender the passport on its renewal within three days of obtaining the passport. It seems that the court has acted in a vengeance. The above said directions are out of place and it is not required to be made. This is not expected from a court of law also. Therefore, the said ee thee Bear 2016/KER/68 CRL.M.C.No. 8061 of 2015 2: directions contained in Annexure-A4 order are expunged. This Crl.M.C is disposed of as above. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE ul/- [True copy] PS. to Judge
